name: Brutal Badger
description:
Brutal Badger - Stress Relief!

Relieve your daily stress by utterly destroying everything around you! Designed to help kids calm down; Brutal Badger is a fast paced smash-em-up that lets players take out their daily frustrations in a harmless, and entertaining way.

Fury has no end. Tap and toss to annihilate everything you can before your rage subdues!

Features
  • Endless Stress Relieving Gameplay
  • Unlockable Skin Packs
  • Achievements & Leaderboards
